entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CDT Saturday 18 March 2023
